channel.title: Harney County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Harney County|Oregon|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: US-395 North at US-20 - Riley
item.description: US-395 North at US-20 in Riley. Use US-20 West to Bend and Portland; use US-395 North/US-20 East to Burns and John Day. US-395 North joins US-20 East to Burns.

item.title: OR-78 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-78 east. Distance to Burns Jct., McDermitt (via US-95) and Winnemucca (Nevada via US-95).

item.title: Lava Bed Road at OR-78
item.description: Lava Bed Road at OR-78. Use OR-78 east to McDermitt and Winnemucca (Nevada); OR-78 west to Crane and Burns.

item.title: Diamond-Grain Camp Rd at OR-205
item.description: End CR-409 at OR-205 to Frenchglen and Burns

item.title: OR-205 North - Diamond Jct.
item.description: OR-205 north approaching Diamond Lane to Diamond.

item.title: OR-205 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-205 north. Distance to Burns.

item.title: OR-205 North - Frenchglen
item.description: Entering Frenchglen on OR-205 north.

item.title: End Rock Creek Road at OR-205
item.description: End Rock Creek Road at OR-205 in Harney County. Turn right for Fields; left for Burns. Use Rock Creek Road for Hart Mountain Refuge and Plush.

item.title: End Rock Creek Road at OR-205
item.description: End Rock Creek Road at OR-205 in Harney County. Turn right for Fields; left for Burns.

item.title: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395
item.description: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395 in Burns. Turn right for US-20 East/US-395 North; continue straight for US-20 West/US-395 South.

item.title: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395
item.description: End OR-78 at US-20/US-395 in Burns.

item.title: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395
item.description: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395 in Burns. Turn right for US-20 East/US-395 North to John Day (via US-395) and Vale (via US-20). Continue straight for US-20 West/US-395 South to Lakeview (via US-395) and Bend (via US-20).

item.title: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395
item.description: OR-78 West Approaching US-20/US-395 in Burns.

item.title: OR-78 West at OR-205 Junction
item.description: OR-78 West at OR-205 Junction. Turn left for the High Desert Discovery Scenic Byway.

item.title: OR-78 West Approaching OR-205
item.description: OR-78 West approaching OR-205 south to Frenchglen and Denio (Nevada).

item.title: OR-78 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-78 west. Distance to Burns.

item.title: OR-78 West - Lawen
item.description: Community of Lawen on OR-78 west.

item.title: OR-78 - Crane Jct.
item.description: OR-78 at Crane Jct. Turn right for Crane, merge left for OR-78 West to Burns.

item.title: OR-78 West - Crane-Buchannan Road Jct.
item.description: OR-78 West approaching Crane-Buchannan Road Jct.

item.title: OR-78 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-78 west. Distance to Crane and Burns.

item.title: OR-78 North - French Round Barn/Diamond Jct.
item.description: OR-78 North at French Round Barn/Diamond Jct.

item.title: OR-78 West - Princeton Post Office
item.description: OR-78 west approaching Diamond Jct. Turn left for Princeton Post Office.

item.title: OR-78 West - Diamond Jct.
item.description: OR-78 West approaching Diamond Jct.

item.title: OR-78 West - Harney County
item.description: Entering Harney County on OR-78 west. Many of the eastern Oregon counties have a tagline on their county welcome sign saying “We Honor Veterans”.

item.title: US-395 South - Milepost 2D
item.description: Milepost 2D on US-395 south. These types of mileposts have been appearing in Oregon in recent years. The letters represent the segment of the internal highway that this particular stretch is part of. In this case the D is the 4th named highway along US-395 south from the Washington line. (A=Umatilla-Stanfield, B=Pendleton-John Day, C=John Day Burns, D=Lakeview-Burns, E=Fremont).

item.title: US-395 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-395 south. Distance to Wagontire, Valley Falls, and Lakeview.

item.title: US-395 South - Next Gas 90 Miles
item.description: Next Gas 90 Miles on US-395 south. The next gas in this case is in Valley Falls. These types of signs are common in eastern Oregon after leaving a settlement with a gas pump.

item.title: US-20 West - Drinkwater Pass
item.description: Drinkwater Pass - Elevation 4212 Feet on US-20 West.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North at OR-78
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 north at OR-78 in Burns.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North Approaching OR-78
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North approaching OR-78. Turn left for US-20 East/US-395 North to John Day (via US-395) and Value (via US-20). Continue straight for OR-78 East to Crane and Winnemucca (Nevada).

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North - Hines Logging Road
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North -at CR-127 Jct (Hines Logging Road). Use CR-127 for FR-47, Yellowjacket Lake, and Delintment Lake in the Malheur National Forest.

item.title: OR-140 West - Welcome To Oregon
item.description: Welcome to Oregon on OR-140 west. Taken at the Oregon-Nevada State Line.

item.title: OR-140 East - Entering Harney County
item.description: Entering Harney County on OR-140 east. Taken at the Harney-Lake County Line. OR-140 briefly enters Harney County before leaving Oregon.

item.title: US-20 East - Next Gas 68 Miles
item.description: Next Gas 68 Miles on US-20 east. Taken just outside of the settlement of Buchanan. The next gas is in the town of Vale.

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North Approaching US-395

item.title: US-20 East/US-395 North Approaching OR-78
item.description: US-20 East/US-395 North approaching OR-78. Stay in the left lane for US-20 East/US-395 North for John Day and Vale.

item.title: US-20 West at US-395 South
item.description: US-20 east at US-395. US-395 joins US-20 east through Burns.

item.title: US-20 East Approaching US-395
